00016 #ifndef BT_CONTACT_SOLVER_INFO
00017 #define BT_CONTACT_SOLVER_INFO
00018 
00019 #include "LinearMath/btScalar.h"
00020 
00021 enum    btSolverMode
00022 {
00023         SOLVER_RANDMIZE_ORDER = 1,
00024         SOLVER_FRICTION_SEPARATE = 2,
00025         SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING = 4,
00026         SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS = 16,
00027         SOLVER_ENABLE_FRICTION_DIRECTION_CACHING = 32,
00028         SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION = 64,
00029         SOLVER_CACHE_FRIENDLY = 128,
00030         SOLVER_SIMD = 256,
00031         SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS = 512,
00032         SOLVER_ALLOW_ZERO_LENGTH_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS = 1024
00033 };
00034 
00035 struct btContactSolverInfoData
00036 {
00037         
00038 
00039         btScalar        m_tau;
00040         btScalar        m_damping;//global non-contact constraint damping, can be locally overridden by constraints during 'getInfo2'.
00041         btScalar        m_friction;
00042         btScalar        m_timeStep;
00043         btScalar        m_restitution;
00044         int             m_numIterations;
00045         btScalar        m_maxErrorReduction;
00046         btScalar        m_sor;//successive over-relaxation term
00047         btScalar        m_erp;//error reduction for non-contact constraints
00048         btScalar        m_erp2;//error reduction for contact constraints
00049         btScalar        m_globalCfm;//constraint force mixing for contacts and non-contacts
00050         btScalar        m_frictionERP;//error reduction for friction constraints
00051         btScalar        m_frictionCFM;//constraint force mixing for friction constraints
00052 
00053         int                     m_splitImpulse;
00054         btScalar        m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold;
00055         btScalar        m_splitImpulseTurnErp;
00056         btScalar        m_linearSlop;
00057         btScalar        m_warmstartingFactor;
00058 
00059         int                     m_solverMode;
00060         int     m_restingContactRestitutionThreshold;
00061         int                     m_minimumSolverBatchSize;
00062         btScalar        m_maxGyroscopicForce;
00063         btScalar        m_singleAxisRollingFrictionThreshold;
00064         btScalar        m_leastSquaresResidualThreshold;
00065         btScalar        m_restitutionVelocityThreshold;
00066 
00067 };
00068 
00069 struct btContactSolverInfo : public btContactSolverInfoData
00070 {
00071 
00072         
00073 
00074         inline btContactSolverInfo()
00075         {
00076                 m_tau = btScalar(0.6);
00077                 m_damping = btScalar(1.0);
00078                 m_friction = btScalar(0.3);
00079                 m_timeStep = btScalar(1.f/60.f);
00080                 m_restitution = btScalar(0.);
00081                 m_maxErrorReduction = btScalar(20.);
00082                 m_numIterations = 10;
00083                 m_erp = btScalar(0.2);
00084                 m_erp2 = btScalar(0.2);
00085                 m_globalCfm = btScalar(0.);
00086                 m_frictionERP = btScalar(0.2);//positional friction 'anchors' are disabled by default
00087                 m_frictionCFM = btScalar(0.);
00088                 m_sor = btScalar(1.);
00089                 m_splitImpulse = true;
00090                 m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold = -.04f;
00091                 m_splitImpulseTurnErp = 0.1f;
00092                 m_linearSlop = btScalar(0.0);
00093                 m_warmstartingFactor=btScalar(0.85);
00094                 //m_solverMode =  SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING |  SOLVER_SIMD | SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION|SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS|SOLVER_ENABLE_FRICTION_DIRECTION_CACHING;// | SOLVER_RANDMIZE_ORDER;
00095                 m_solverMode = SOLVER_USE_WARMSTARTING | SOLVER_SIMD;// | SOLVER_RANDMIZE_ORDER;
00096                 m_restingContactRestitutionThreshold = 2;//unused as of 2.81
00097                 m_minimumSolverBatchSize = 128; //try to combine islands until the amount of constraints reaches this limit
00098                 m_maxGyroscopicForce = 100.f; 
00099                 m_singleAxisRollingFrictionThreshold = 1e30f;
00100                 m_leastSquaresResidualThreshold = 0.f;
00101                 m_restitutionVelocityThreshold = 0.2f;//if the relative velocity is below this threshold, there is zero restitution
00102         }
00103 };
00104 
00106 struct btContactSolverInfoDoubleData
00107 {
00108         double          m_tau;
00109         double          m_damping;//global non-contact constraint damping, can be locally overridden by constraints during 'getInfo2'.
00110         double          m_friction;
00111         double          m_timeStep;
00112         double          m_restitution;
00113         double          m_maxErrorReduction;
00114         double          m_sor;
00115         double          m_erp;//used as Baumgarte factor
00116         double          m_erp2;//used in Split Impulse
00117         double          m_globalCfm;//constraint force mixing
00118         double          m_splitImpulsePenetrationThreshold;
00119         double          m_splitImpulseTurnErp;
00120         double          m_linearSlop;
00121         double          m_warmstartingFactor;
00122         double          m_maxGyroscopicForce;
00123         double          m_singleAxisRollingFrictionThreshold;
00124 
00125         int                     m_numIterations;
00126         int                     m_solverMode;
00127         int                     m_restingContactRestitutionThreshold;
00128         int                     m_minimumSolverBatchSize;
00129         int                     m_splitImpulse;
00130         char            m_padding[4];
00131 
00132 };

00137         float           m_damping;//global non-contact constraint damping, can be locally overridden by constraints during 'getInfo2'.
00138         float           m_friction;
00139         float           m_timeStep;

00150
